"Memento" is a psychological thriller directed by Christopher Nolan and starring Tom Hardy,耗尽、艾米莉·帕克、大卫·斯特拉汉，以及罗莎·派森。

The movie tells the story of Memento (Tom Hardy), who has short-term memory loss. He begins a journey to find his wife's killer.

As he travels through time, Memento experiences flashbacks of key moments in his life.

Through these flashbacks, Memento is able to piece together some key details about his wife's killer.

Throughout the movie, there are many different twists and turns that keep the audience guessing what will happen next.

Overall, "Memento" is a truly outstanding film with an incredibly unique premise and tone.

It is a film that you simply cannot help but watch all the way through to see just how it ends up.
